description: Defines the structured responses for all action policies referenced by ACVM and other manifests.

P-01_HALT_RESOLUTION.description: Immediately halt the P-01 finality resolution attempt. Requires CRITICAL severity logs and notification to the ACVD monitor.

P-01_ROLLBACK_SELF.description: Trigger an immediate rollback or self-correction mechanism to the last validated state. Only applies during pre-flight checks.

LOG_AND_FLAG.description: Log the deviation as a high-priority warning and flag the affected state for human review without interrupting finality.
